title: Cranberry Pear Cider

ingredients.content: 1 orange, thin peel only, no pith, plus 3 oz juice, plus orange wedges to serve
1 lemon, thin peel only, no pith, plus 2 oz juice
6 oz cranberries, plus extra, sugared to garnish (see Tip)
½ oz ginger, cut into pieces
8 sprigs fresh rosemary, to garnish (see Tip)

preparations.content: Place orange peel, lemon peel, cinnamon stick, cloves and allspice into mixing bowl and grind <b>5 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add pears, apples, cranberries, brown sugar and ginger and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add water, 3 oz orange juice and 2 oz lemon juice and without measuring cup cook <b>18 min/212°F/speed 2<b>. Strain through a fine mesh sieve and divide into glasses.
Thread prepared sugared cranberries (see Tip) onto rosemary sprigs, place onto glasses with a wedge of orange and serve warm or over ice.

hintsAndTricks: To sugar cranberries: rinse and drain approximately 24 cranberries. Toss cranberries with ¼-⅔ cup sugar in a small bowl to coat. Spread in a single layer on a baking sheet and allow to dry (approx. 1 hr.).
Add one jigger (1½ oz) bourbon, whiskey or brandy.
